message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a very reasonable price of $20,000. I think it will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am unable to meet you at $15,000. My maximum budget remains at $10,000. I hope we can find a middle ground.
